name: Syko Swinger
description:
Syko Swinger is an experimental physics based game that features a unique core mechanic and psychedelic visual effects.How to PlaySwing the life-ball in a smooth rhythm of circular motion and avoid hitting on screen obstacles.

Swing around the starry obstacles if you lose points to gain back your momentum.Game features1: Physics based core mechanic

2: Adaptive difficulty
3: Reactive afx/vfx
4: Full Vector graphics art style
5: Random color palletDeveloper's reviewA biased review of this game would be - it's unique and trippy af. The swinging motion can be addictive and takes muscle memory to master.

Pros: The game feels fresh every time. The art style is unique and the game gets increasingly engrossing when you least expect it.
Cons: If you're not into trying new stuff, you won't like this game
